title: Welcome To Ampplified Photons
text:
Why this blog?
Welcome to the fascinating world of fiber optics and computational physics! This blog will take you on a journey from the basics of Raman amplification to implementing a fully functional simulation in Julia. Whether you’re a graduate student diving into nonlinear optics, a researcher exploring new amplifier designs, or simply curious about how the internet’s backbone actually works, this guide will give you practical, hands-on experience with one of the most important technologies in modern telecommunications.

title: Welcome To Ampplified Photons
text:
Who is this blog for?
This blog targets:

Graduate students in optics, photonics, or electrical engineering who need to simulate fiber amplifiers
Researchers working on telecommunications systems, laser physics, or nonlinear optics
Hobbyists interested in computational physics and fiber optics
Engineers designing or optimizing optical communication systems
